title: Black Ops Cold War Loadout Generator
description: Create unique multiplayer loadouts with diverse Wildcards and a classic Pick 10 feel. Find your next go-to class setup.

title: Black Ops Cold War Zombies Loadout Generator
description: Assemble the perfect loadout to survive the Dark Aether. Get recommendations for weapons, field upgrades, and perks.

title: Black Ops 4 Loadout Generator
description: Master the specialist system by generating random classes. Discover powerful combinations of gear and perks for your next match.

title: Black Ops 4 Zombies Loadout Generator
description: Challenge the Chaos or Aether story with a random loadout. Find the ideal mix of elixirs, talismans, and special weapons.

title: Black Ops 4 Zombies Custom Mutations
description: Generate random settings for a custom zombies experience. Create a unique challenge by tweaking dozens of game rules.

title: Black Ops 6 Loadout Generator
description: Prepare for the launch of Black Ops 6. Experiment with the next evolution of loadouts and find a new strategy.

title: Black Ops 6 Zombies Loadout Generator
description: Get ready for the return of round-based zombies! Generate a random class to take on the new undead threats.

title: Black Ops 3 Loadout Generator
description: Explore the advanced movement and specialist abilities of BO3 with a randomly generated class. Perfect for revisiting a classic.

title: Infinite Warfare Loadout Generator
description: Dominate in zero-g with a fresh loadout. Generate classes with unique Combat Rigs, payloads, and traits.

title: MWR Loadout Generator
description: Rediscover boots-on-the-ground combat. Get a classic loadout and challenge your skills in this remastered favorite.

title: MW3 Loadout Generator
description: Navigate the complex gunsmith of Modern Warfare 3. Let us generate a full build, from primary weapon to gear.

title: MW3 Zombies Loadout Generator
description: Prepare for the open-world zombie experience. Get a random loadout to take on hordes and complete contracts.

title: MW2 Loadout Generator
description: Create a random class for Modern Warfare 2's fast-paced multiplayer. Find a new weapon build and perk package.

title: Vanguard Loadout Generator
description: Experiment with Vanguard's extensive attachment system. Generate a unique loadout with up to 10 attachments.

title: Vanguard Zombies Loadout Generator
description: Survive the undead with a random class. Discover powerful combinations of artifacts, covenants, and perks.

title: Warzone Loadout Generator
description: Struggling to pick a loadout for your next drop? Generate a complete class, including weapons and perks, for any playstyle.

title: Warzone Where We Droppin
description: Can't decide where to drop in Warzone? Let us pick a random POI for you and your squad. Hot drop or safe landing?

title: World At War Loadout Generator
description: Return to the gritty battlefields of WWII. Get a random class and experience the game that started zombies.

title: World War 2 Loadout Generator
description: Challenge yourself in boots-on-the-ground combat. Generate a class with different division skills and training.

title: World War 2 Zombies Loadout Generator
description: Gear up to fight the undead army. Get a randomized loadout with different mods, special abilities, and perks.

title: World War 2 Custom Match
description: Generate random settings for a custom multiplayer match. Create a fun and unpredictable experience for you and your friends.
